IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/entity/Customer.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.entity;\n\nimport jakarta.persistence.*;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.Email;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.NotBlank;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.Size;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonManagedReference;\n\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Entity\n@Table(name = \"customers\")\npublic class Customer {\n \n @Id\n @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\n private Long id;\n \n @NotBlank(message = \"First name is required\")\n @Size(max = 50, message = \"First name must not exceed 50 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"first_name\", nullable = false)\n private String firstName;\n \n @NotBlank(message = \"Last name is required\")\n @Size(max = 50, message = \"Last name must not exceed 50 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"last_name\", nullable = false)\n private String lastName;\n \n @NotBlank(message = \"Email is required\")\n @Email(message = \"Email should be valid\")\n @Column(name = \"email\", nullable = false, unique = true)\n private String email;\n \n @Size(max = 15, message = \"Phone number must not exceed 15 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"phone\")\n private String phone;\n \n @Size(max = 255, message = \"Address must not exceed 255 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"address\")\n private String address;\n \n @Column(name = \"created_at\")\n private LocalDateTime createdAt;\n \n @Column(name = \"updated_at\")\n private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\n \n @OneToMany(mappedBy = \"customer\", cascade = CascadeType.ALL, fetch = FetchType.LAZY)\n @JsonManagedReference\n private List orders = new ArrayList<>();\n \n // Constructors\n public Customer() {}\n \n public Customer(String firstName, String lastName, String email) {\n this.firstName = firstName;\n this.lastName = lastName;\n this.email = email;\n }\n \n // Lifecycle callbacks\n @PrePersist\n protected void onCreate() {\n createdAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n @PreUpdate\n protected void onUpdate() {\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n // Getters and Setters\n public Long getId() { return id; }\n public void setId(Long id) { this.id = id; }\n \n public String getFirstName() { return firstName; }\n public void setFirstName(String firstName) { this.firstName = firstName; }\n \n public String getLastName() { return lastName; }\n public void setLastName(String lastName) { this.lastName = lastName; }\n \n public String getEmail() { return email; }\n public void setEmail(String email) { this.email = email; }\n \n public String getPhone() { return phone; }\n public void setPhone(String phone) { this.phone = phone; }\n \n public String getAddress() { return address; }\n public void setAddress(String address) { this.address = address; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getCreatedAt() { return createdAt; }\n public void setCreatedAt(LocalDateTime createdAt) { this.createdAt = createdAt; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getUpdatedAt() { return updatedAt; }\n public void setUpdatedAt(LocalDateTime updatedAt) { this.updatedAt = updatedAt; }\n \n public List getOrders() { return orders; }\n public void setOrders(List orders) { this.orders = orders; }\n \n // Helper methods\n public String getFullName() {\n return firstName + \" \" + lastName;\n }\n \n public void addOrder(Order order) {\n orders.add(order);\n order.setCustomer(this);\n }\n \n public void removeOrder(Order order) {\n orders.remove(order);\n order.setCustomer(null);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/entity/Product.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.entity;\n\nimport jakarta.persistence.*;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.DecimalMin;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.Min;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.NotBlank;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.Size;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonManagedReference;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Entity\n@Table(name = \"products\")\npublic class Product {\n \n @Id\n @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\n private Long id;\n \n @NotBlank(message = \"Product name is required\")\n @Size(max = 100, message = \"Product name must not exceed 100 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"name\", nullable = false)\n private String name;\n \n @Size(max = 500, message = \"Description must not exceed 500 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"description\")\n private String description;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Price is required\")\n @DecimalMin(value = \"0.0\", inclusive = false, message = \"Price must be greater than 0\")\n @Column(name = \"price\", nullable = false, precision = 10, scale = 2)\n private BigDecimal price;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Stock quantity is required\")\n @Min(value = 0, message = \"Stock quantity cannot be negative\")\n @Column(name = \"stock_quantity\", nullable = false)\n private Integer stockQuantity;\n \n @Size(max = 50, message = \"Category must not exceed 50 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"category\")\n private String category;\n \n @Size(max = 50, message = \"Brand must not exceed 50 characters\")\n @Column(name = \"brand\")\n private String brand;\n \n @Column(name = \"is_active\")\n private Boolean isActive = true;\n \n @Column(name = \"created_at\")\n private LocalDateTime createdAt;\n \n @Column(name = \"updated_at\")\n private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\n \n @OneToMany(mappedBy = \"product\", cascade = CascadeType.ALL, fetch = FetchType.LAZY)\n @JsonManagedReference\n private List orderItems = new ArrayList<>();\n \n // Constructors\n public Product() {}\n \n public Product(String name, BigDecimal price, Integer stockQuantity) {\n this.name = name;\n this.price = price;\n this.stockQuantity = stockQuantity;\n }\n \n // Lifecycle callbacks\n @PrePersist\n protected void onCreate() {\n createdAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n @PreUpdate\n protected void onUpdate() {\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n // Getters and Setters\n public Long getId() { return id; }\n public void setId(Long id) { this.id = id; }\n \n public String getName() { return name; }\n public void setName(String name) { this.name = name; }\n \n public String getDescription() { return description; }\n public void setDescription(String description) { this.description = description; }\n \n public BigDecimal getPrice() { return price; }\n public void setPrice(BigDecimal price) { this.price = price; }\n \n public Integer getStockQuantity() { return stockQuantity; }\n public void setStockQuantity(Integer stockQuantity) { this.stockQuantity = stockQuantity; }\n \n public String getCategory() { return category; }\n public void setCategory(String category) { this.category = category; }\n \n public String getBrand() { return brand; }\n public void setBrand(String brand) { this.brand = brand; }\n \n public Boolean getIsActive() { return isActive; }\n public void setIsActive(Boolean isActive) { this.isActive = isActive; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getCreatedAt() { return createdAt; }\n public void setCreatedAt(LocalDateTime createdAt) { this.createdAt = createdAt; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getUpdatedAt() { return updatedAt; }\n public void setUpdatedAt(LocalDateTime updatedAt) { this.updatedAt = updatedAt; }\n \n public List getOrderItems() { return orderItems; }\n public void setOrderItems(List orderItems) { this.orderItems = orderItems; }\n \n // Helper methods\n public boolean isInStock() {\n return stockQuantity > 0;\n }\n \n public boolean isAvailable() {\n return isActive && isInStock();\n }\n \n public void reduceStock(int quantity) {\n if (stockQuantity >= quantity) {\n stockQuantity -= quantity;\n } else {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Insufficient stock\");\n }\n }\n \n public void increaseStock(int quantity) {\n stockQuantity += quantity;\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "package com.example.ecommerce.entity;\n\nimport jakarta.persistence.*;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonBackReference;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonManagedReference;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.ArrayList;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Entity\n@Table(name = \"orders\")\npublic class Order {\n \n @Id\n @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\n private Long id;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Customer is required\")\n @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY)\n @JoinColumn(name = \"customer_id\", nullable = false)\n @JsonBackReference\n private Customer customer;\n \n @Column(name = \"order_date\", nullable = false)\n private LocalDateTime orderDate;\n \n @Enumerated(EnumType.STRING)\n @Column(name = \"status\", nullable = false)\n private OrderStatus status = OrderStatus.PENDING;\n \n @Column(name = \"total_amount\", precision = 10, scale = 2)\n private BigDecimal totalAmount = BigDecimal.ZERO;\n \n @Column(name = \"shipping_address\")\n private String shippingAddress;\n \n @Column(name = \"created_at\")\n private LocalDateTime createdAt;\n \n @Column(name = \"updated_at\")\n private LocalDateTime updatedAt;\n \n @OneToMany(mappedBy = \"order\", cascade = CascadeType.ALL, fetch = FetchType.LAZY, orphanRemoval = true)\n @JsonManagedReference\n private List orderItems = new ArrayList<>();\n \n // Constructors\n public Order() {}\n \n public Order(Customer customer) {\n this.customer = customer;\n this.orderDate = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n // Lifecycle callbacks\n @PrePersist\n protected void onCreate() {\n createdAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n if (orderDate == null) {\n orderDate = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n }\n \n @PreUpdate\n protected void onUpdate() {\n updatedAt = LocalDateTime.now();\n }\n \n // Getters and Setters\n public Long getId() { return id; }\n public void setId(Long id) { this.id = id; }\n \n public Customer getCustomer() { return customer; }\n public void setCustomer(Customer customer) { this.customer = customer; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getOrderDate() { return orderDate; }\n public void setOrderDate(LocalDateTime orderDate) { this.orderDate = orderDate; }\n \n public OrderStatus getStatus() { return status; }\n public void setStatus(OrderStatus status) { this.status = status; }\n \n public BigDecimal getTotalAmount() { return totalAmount; }\n public void setTotalAmount(BigDecimal totalAmount) { this.totalAmount = totalAmount; }\n \n public String getShippingAddress() { return shippingAddress; }\n public void setShippingAddress(String shippingAddress) { this.shippingAddress = shippingAddress; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getCreatedAt() { return createdAt; }\n public void setCreatedAt(LocalDateTime createdAt) { this.createdAt = createdAt; }\n \n public LocalDateTime getUpdatedAt() { return updatedAt; }\n public void setUpdatedAt(LocalDateTime updatedAt) { this.updatedAt = updatedAt; }\n \n public List getOrderItems() { return orderItems; }\n public void setOrderItems(List orderItems) { this.orderItems = orderItems; }\n \n // Helper methods\n public void addOrderItem(OrderItem orderItem) {\n orderItems.add(orderItem);\n orderItem.setOrder(this);\n calculateTotalAmount();\n }\n \n public void removeOrderItem(OrderItem orderItem) {\n orderItems.remove(orderItem);\n orderItem.setOrder(null);\n calculateTotalAmount();\n }\n \n public void calculateTotalAmount() {\n totalAmount = orderItems.stream()\n .map(OrderItem::getSubtotal)\n .reduce(BigDecimal.ZERO, BigDecimal::add);\n }\n \n public int getTotalItems() {\n return orderItems.stream()\n .mapToInt(OrderItem::getQuantity)\n .sum();\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/entity/OrderItem.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.entity;\n\nimport jakarta.persistence.*;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.Min;\nimport jakarta.validation.constraints.NotNull;\nimport com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonBackReference;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\n\n@Entity\n@Table(name = \"order_items\")\npublic class OrderItem {\n \n @Id\n @GeneratedValue(strategy = GenerationType.IDENTITY)\n private Long id;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Order is required\")\n @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY)\n @JoinColumn(name = \"order_id\", nullable = false)\n @JsonBackReference\n private Order order;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Product is required\")\n @ManyToOne(fetch = FetchType.LAZY)\n @JoinColumn(name = \"product_id\", nullable = false)\n @JsonBackReference\n private Product product;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Quantity is required\")\n @Min(value = 1, message = \"Quantity must be at least 1\")\n @Column(name = \"quantity\", nullable = false)\n private Integer quantity;\n \n @NotNull(message = \"Unit price is required\")\n @Column(name = \"unit_price\", nullable = false, precision = 10, scale = 2)\n private BigDecimal unitPrice;\n \n @Column(name = \"subtotal\", precision = 10, scale = 2)\n private BigDecimal subtotal;\n \n // Constructors\n public OrderItem() {}\n \n public OrderItem(Order order, Product product, Integer quantity, BigDecimal unitPrice) {\n this.order = order;\n this.product = product;\n this.quantity = quantity;\n this.unitPrice = unitPrice;\n calculateSubtotal();\n }\n \n // Lifecycle callbacks\n @PrePersist\n @PreUpdate\n protected void calculateSubtotal() {\n if (quantity != null && unitPrice != null) {\n subtotal = unitPrice.multiply(BigDecimal.valueOf(quantity));\n }\n }\n \n // Getters and Setters\n public Long getId() { return id; }\n public void setId(Long id) { this.id = id; }\n \n public Order getOrder() { return order; }\n public void setOrder(Order order) { this.order = order; }\n \n public Product getProduct() { return product; }\n public void setProduct(Product product) { this.product = product; }\n \n public Integer getQuantity() { return quantity; }\n public void setQuantity(Integer quantity) { \n this.quantity = quantity;\n calculateSubtotal();\n }\n \n public BigDecimal getUnitPrice() { return unitPrice; }\n public void setUnitPrice(BigDecimal unitPrice) { \n this.unitPrice = unitPrice;\n calculateSubtotal();\n }\n \n public BigDecimal getSubtotal() { return subtotal; }\n public void setSubtotal(BigDecimal subtotal) { this.subtotal = subtotal; }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File saved. "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.repository;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Customer;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Repository\npublic interface CustomerRepository extends JpaRepository {\n \n // Find customer by email\n Optional findByEmail(String email);\n \n // Check if customer exists by email\n boolean existsByEmail(String email);\n \n // Find customers by first name (case insensitive)\n List findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCase(String firstName);\n \n // Find customers by last name (case insensitive)\n List findByLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(String lastName);\n \n // Find customers by full name (case insensitive)\n @Query(\"SELECT c FROM Customer c WHERE \" +\n \"LOWER(CONCAT(c.firstName, ' ', c.lastName)) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :fullName, '%'))\")\n List findByFullNameContainingIgnoreCase(@Param(\"fullName\") String fullName);\n \n // Find customers by phone number\n Optional findByPhone(String phone);\n \n // Find customers by address containing keyword\n List findByAddressContainingIgnoreCase(String address);\n \n // Find customers with orders\n @Query(\"SELECT DISTINCT c FROM Customer c JOIN c.orders o\")\n List findCustomersWithOrders();\n \n // Find customers without orders\n @Query(\"SELECT c FROM Customer c WHERE c.orders IS EMPTY\")\n List findCustomersWithoutOrders();\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.repository;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Product;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Repository\npublic interface ProductRepository extends JpaRepository {\n \n // Find products by name (case insensitive)\n List findByNameContainingIgnoreCase(String name);\n \n // Find products by category\n List findByCategoryIgnoreCase(String category);\n \n // Find products by brand\n List findByBrandIgnoreCase(String brand);\n \n // Find active products\n List findByIsActiveTrue();\n \n // Find inactive products\n List findByIsActiveFalse();\n \n // Find products in stock\n @Query(\"SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.stockQuantity > 0\")\n List findProductsInStock();\n \n // Find products out of stock\n @Query(\"SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE p.stockQuantity = 0\")\n List findProductsOutOfStock();\n \n // Find products by price range\n List findByPriceBetween(BigDecimal minPrice, BigDecimal maxPrice);\n \n // Find products by price less than or equal to\n List findByPriceLessThanEqual(BigDecimal maxPrice);\n \n // Find products by price greater than or equal to\n List findByPriceGreaterThanEqual(BigDecimal minPrice);\n \n // Find products by category and active status\n List findByCategoryIgnoreCaseAndIsActiveTrue(String category);\n \n // Find products by brand and active status\n List findByBrandIgnoreCaseAndIsActiveTrue(String brand);\n \n // Search products by name, description, category, or brand\n @Query(\"SELECT p FROM Product p WHERE \" +\n \"LOWER(p.name) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :keyword, '%')) OR \" +\n \"LOWER(p.description) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :keyword, '%')) OR \" +\n \"LOWER(p.category) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :keyword, '%')) OR \" +\n \"LOWER(p.brand) LIKE LOWER(CONCAT('%', :keyword, '%'))\")\n List searchProducts(@Param(\"keyword\") String keyword);\n \n // Find top selling products (based on order items)\n @Query(\"SELECT p FROM Product p JOIN p.orderItems oi \" +\n \"GROUP BY p ORDER BY SUM(oi.quantity) DESC\")\n List findTopSellingProducts();\n \n // Get distinct categories\n @Query(\"SELECT DISTINCT p.category FROM Product p WHERE p.category IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.category\")\n List findDistinctCategories();\n \n // Get distinct brands\n @Query(\"SELECT DISTINCT p.brand FROM Product p WHERE p.brand IS NOT NULL ORDER BY p.brand\")\n List findDistinctBrands();\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/repository/OrderRepository.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.repository;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Order;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.OrderStatus;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Repository\npublic interface OrderRepository extends JpaRepository {\n \n // Find orders by customer ID\n List findByCustomerId(Long customerId);\n \n // Find orders by customer ID ordered by order date descending\n List findByCustomerIdOrderByOrderDateDesc(Long customerId);\n \n // Find orders by status\n List findByStatus(OrderStatus status);\n \n // Find orders by status ordered by order date\n List findByStatusOrderByOrderDateDesc(OrderStatus status);\n \n // Find orders by date range\n List findByOrderDateBetween(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate);\n \n // Find orders by total amount range\n List findByTotalAmountBetween(BigDecimal minAmount, BigDecimal maxAmount);\n \n // Find orders by total amount greater than or equal to\n List findByTotalAmountGreaterThanEqual(BigDecimal minAmount);\n \n // Find orders by customer and status\n List findByCustomerIdAndStatus(Long customerId, OrderStatus status);\n \n // Find orders by customer and date range\n List findByCustomerIdAndOrderDateBetween(Long customerId, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate);\n \n // Find recent orders (last 30 days)\n @Query(\"SELECT o FROM Order o WHERE o.orderDate >= :thirtyDaysAgo ORDER BY o.orderDate DESC\")\n List findRecentOrders(@Param(\"thirtyDaysAgo\") LocalDateTime thirtyDaysAgo);\n \n // Find orders by shipping address containing keyword\n List findByShippingAddressContainingIgnoreCase(String address);\n \n // Get total sales amount\n @Query(\"SELECT SUM(o.totalAmount) FROM Order o WHERE o.status != 'CANCELLED'\")\n BigDecimal getTotalSalesAmount();\n \n // Get total sales amount by date range\n @Query(\"SELECT SUM(o.totalAmount) FROM Order o WHERE o.orderDate BETWEEN :startDate AND :endDate AND o.status != 'CANCELLED'\")\n BigDecimal getTotalSalesAmountByDateRange(@Param(\"startDate\") LocalDateTime startDate, @Param(\"endDate\") LocalDateTime endDate);\n \n // Get order count by status\n @Query(\"SELECT COUNT(o) FROM Order o WHERE o.status = :status\")\n Long countOrdersByStatus(@Param(\"status\") OrderStatus status);\n \n // Find top customers by order count\n @Query(\"SELECT o.customer.id, COUNT(o) as orderCount FROM Order o \" +\n \"GROUP BY o.customer.id ORDER BY orderCount DESC\")\n List findTopCustomersByOrderCount();\n \n // Find top customers by total amount spent\n @Query(\"SELECT o.customer.id, SUM(o.totalAmount) as totalSpent FROM Order o \" +\n \"WHERE o.status != 'CANCELLED' \" +\n \"GROUP BY o.customer.id ORDER BY totalSpent DESC\")\n List findTopCustomersByTotalSpent();\n \n // Get monthly sales report\n @Query(\"SELECT YEAR(o.orderDate), MONTH(o.orderDate), SUM(o.totalAmount), COUNT(o) \" +\n \"FROM Order o WHERE o.status != "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.repository;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.OrderItem;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository;\nimport org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.Query;\nimport org.springframework.data.repository.query.Param;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Repository;\n\nimport java.util.List;\n\n@Repository\npublic interface OrderItemRepository extends JpaRepository {\n \n // Find order items by order ID\n List findByOrderId(Long orderId);\n \n // Find order items by product ID\n List findByProductId(Long productId);\n \n // Find order items by order ID and product ID\n List findByOrderIdAndProductId(Long orderId, Long productId);\n \n // Get total quantity sold for a product\n @Query(\"SELECT SUM(oi.quantity) FROM OrderItem oi WHERE oi.product.id = :productId\")\n Long getTotalQuantitySoldForProduct(@Param(\"productId\") Long productId);\n \n // Get total revenue for a product\n @Query(\"SELECT SUM(oi.subtotal) FROM OrderItem oi WHERE oi.product.id = :productId\")\n Double getTotalRevenueForProduct(@Param(\"productId\") Long productId);\n \n // Find best selling products\n @Query(\"SELECT oi.product.id, oi.product.name, SUM(oi.quantity) as totalSold \" +\n \"FROM OrderItem oi \" +\n \"GROUP BY oi.product.id, oi.product.name \" +\n \"ORDER BY totalSold DESC\")\n List findBestSellingProducts();\n \n // Find products by revenue\n @Query(\"SELECT oi.product.id, oi.product.name, SUM(oi.subtotal) as totalRevenue \" +\n \"FROM OrderItem oi \" +\n \"GROUP BY oi.product.id, oi.product.name \" +\n \"ORDER BY totalRevenue DESC\")\n List findProductsByRevenue();\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.service;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Customer;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.repository.CustomerRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\nimport org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\n@Transactional\npublic class CustomerService {\n \n private final CustomerRepository customerRepository;\n \n @Autowired\n public CustomerService(CustomerRepository customerRepository) {\n this.customerRepository = customerRepository;\n }\n \n // Create a new customer\n public Customer createCustomer(Customer customer) {\n // Check if email already exists\n if (customerRepository.existsByEmail(customer.getEmail())) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Customer with email \" + customer.getEmail() + \" already exists\");\n }\n return customerRepository.save(customer);\n }\n \n // Get all customers\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getAllCustomers() {\n return customerRepository.findAll();\n }\n \n // Get customer by ID\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Optional getCustomerById(Long id) {\n return customerRepository.findById(id);\n }\n \n // Get customer by email\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Optional getCustomerByEmail(String email) {\n return customerRepository.findByEmail(email);\n }\n \n // Update customer\n public Customer updateCustomer(Long id, Customer customerDetails) {\n Customer customer = customerRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Customer not found with id: \" + id));\n \n // Check if email is being changed and if new email already exists\n if (!customer.getEmail().equals(customerDetails.getEmail()) && \n customerRepository.existsByEmail(customerDetails.getEmail())) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Customer with email \" + customerDetails.getEmail() + \" already exists\");\n }\n \n customer.setFirstName(customerDetails.getFirstName());\n customer.setLastName(customerDetails.getLastName());\n customer.setEmail(customerDetails.getEmail());\n customer.setPhone(customerDetails.getPhone());\n customer.setAddress(customerDetails.getAddress());\n \n return customerRepository.save(customer);\n }\n \n // Delete customer\n public void deleteCustomer(Long id) {\n Customer customer = customerRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Customer not found with id: \" + id));\n customerRepository.delete(customer);\n }\n \n // Search customers by name\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchCustomersByName(String name) {\n return customerRepository.findByFullNameContainingIgnoreCase(name);\n }\n \n // Search customers by first name\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchCustomersByFirstName(String firstName) {\n return customerRepository.findByFirstNameContainingIgnoreCase(firstName);\n }\n \n // Search customers by last name\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchCustomersByLastName(String lastName) {\n return customerRepository.findByLastNameContainingIgnoreCase(lastName);\n }\n \n // Get customers with orders\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getCustomersWithOrders() {\n return customerRepository.findCustomersWithOrders();\n }\n \n // Get customers without orders\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getCustomersWithoutOrders() {\n return customerRepository.findCustomersWithoutOrders();\n }\n \n // Check if customer exists by email\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public boolean existsByEmail(String email) {\n return customerRepository.existsByEmail(email);\n }\n \n // Get customer by phone\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Optional getCustomerByPhone(String phone) {\n return customerRepository.findByPhone(phone);\n }\n \n // Search customers by address\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchCustomersByAddress(String address) {\n return customerRepository.findByAddressContainingIgnoreCase(address);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/service/ProductService.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.service;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Product;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.repository.ProductRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\nimport org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\n@Transactional\npublic class ProductService {\n \n private final ProductRepository productRepository;\n \n @Autowired\n public ProductService(ProductRepository productRepository) {\n this.productRepository = productRepository;\n }\n \n // Create a new product\n public Product createProduct(Product product) {\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Get all products\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getAllProducts() {\n return productRepository.findAll();\n }\n \n // Get product by ID\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Optional getProductById(Long id) {\n return productRepository.findById(id);\n }\n \n // Update product\n public Product updateProduct(Long id, Product productDetails) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n product.setName(productDetails.getName());\n product.setDescription(productDetails.getDescription());\n product.setPrice(productDetails.getPrice());\n product.setStockQuantity(productDetails.getStockQuantity());\n product.setCategory(productDetails.getCategory());\n product.setBrand(productDetails.getBrand());\n product.setIsActive(productDetails.getIsActive());\n \n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Delete product\n public void deleteProduct(Long id) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n productRepository.delete(product);\n }\n \n // Search products by name\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchProductsByName(String name) {\n return productRepository.findByNameContainingIgnoreCase(name);\n }\n \n // Get products by category\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getProductsByCategory(String category) {\n return productRepository.findByCategoryIgnoreCase(category);\n }\n \n // Get products by brand\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getProductsByBrand(String brand) {\n return productRepository.findByBrandIgnoreCase(brand);\n }\n \n // Get active products\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getActiveProducts() {\n return productRepository.findByIsActiveTrue();\n }\n \n // Get inactive products\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getInactiveProducts() {\n return productRepository.findByIsActiveFalse();\n }\n \n // Get products in stock\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getProductsInStock() {\n return productRepository.findProductsInStock();\n }\n \n // Get products out of stock\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getProductsOutOfStock() {\n return productRepository.findProductsOutOfStock();\n }\n \n // Get products by price range\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getProductsByPriceRange(BigDecimal minPrice, BigDecimal maxPrice) {\n return productRepository.findByPriceBetween(minPrice, maxPrice);\n }\n \n // Search products\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List searchProducts(String keyword) {\n return productRepository.searchProducts(keyword);\n }\n \n // Get top selling products\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getTopSellingProducts() {\n return productRepository.findTopSellingProducts();\n }\n \n // Get distinct categories\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getDistinctCategories() {\n return productRepository.findDistinctCategories();\n }\n \n // Get distinct brands\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getDistinctBrands() {\n return productRepository.findDistinctBrands();\n }\n \n // Update stock quantity\n public Product updateStock(Long id, Integer newStockQuantity) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n product.setStockQuantity(newStockQuantity);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Reduce stock (for order processing)\n public Product reduceStock(Long id, Integer quantity) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n if (product.getStockQuantity() < quantity) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Insufficient stock for product: \" + product.getName());\n }\n \n product.reduceStock(quantity);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Increase stock (for returns/restocking)\n public Product increaseStock(Long id, Integer quantity) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n product.increaseStock(quantity);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Activate product\n public Product activateProduct(Long id) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n product.setIsActive(true);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n \n // Deactivate product\n public Product deactivateProduct(Long id) {\n Product product = productRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + id));\n \n product.setIsActive(false);\n return productRepository.save(product);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/service/OrderService.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.service;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.*;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.repository.OrderRepository;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.repository.OrderItemRepository;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Service;\nimport org.springframework.transaction.annotation.Transactional;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@Service\n@Transactional\npublic class OrderService {\n \n private final OrderRepository orderRepository;\n private final OrderItemRepository orderItemRepository;\n private final CustomerService customerService;\n private final ProductService productService;\n \n @Autowired\n public OrderService(OrderRepository orderRepository, \n OrderItemRepository orderItemRepository,\n CustomerService customerService,\n ProductService productService) {\n this.orderRepository = orderRepository;\n this.orderItemRepository = orderItemRepository;\n this.customerService = customerService;\n this.productService = productService;\n }\n \n // Create a new order\n public Order createOrder(Long customerId, String shippingAddress) {\n Customer customer = customerService.getCustomerById(customerId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Customer not found with id: \" + customerId));\n \n Order order = new Order(customer);\n order.setShippingAddress(shippingAddress);\n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Get all orders\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getAllOrders() {\n return orderRepository.findAll();\n }\n \n // Get order by ID\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Optional getOrderById(Long id) {\n return orderRepository.findById(id);\n }\n \n // Get orders by customer ID\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getOrdersByCustomerId(Long customerId) {\n return orderRepository.findByCustomerIdOrderByOrderDateDesc(customerId);\n }\n \n // Get orders by status\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getOrdersByStatus(OrderStatus status) {\n return orderRepository.findByStatusOrderByOrderDateDesc(status);\n }\n \n // Update order status\n public Order updateOrderStatus(Long id, OrderStatus status) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + id));\n \n order.setStatus(status);\n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Add item to order\n public Order addItemToOrder(Long orderId, Long productId, Integer quantity) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(orderId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + orderId));\n \n Product product = productService.getProductById(productId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found with id: \" + productId));\n \n // Check if product is available\n if (!product.isAvailable()) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Product is not available: \" + product.getName());\n }\n \n // Check stock availability\n if (product.getStockQuantity() < quantity) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Insufficient stock for product: \" + product.getName());\n }\n \n // Check if item already exists in order\n Optional existingItem = order.getOrderItems().stream()\n .filter(item -> item.getProduct().getId().equals(productId))\n .findFirst();\n \n if (existingItem.isPresent()) {\n // Update quantity of existing item\n OrderItem item = existingItem.get();\n int newQuantity = item.getQuantity() + quantity;\n \n if (product.getStockQuantity() < newQuantity) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Insufficient stock for product: \" + product.getName());\n }\n \n item.setQuantity(newQuantity);\n orderItemRepository.save(item);\n } else {\n // Create new order item\n OrderItem orderItem = new OrderItem(order, product, quantity, product.getPrice());\n order.addOrderItem(orderItem);\n orderItemRepository.save(orderItem);\n }\n \n // Reduce product stock\n productService.reduceStock(productId, quantity);\n \n // Recalculate total amount\n order.calculateTotalAmount();\n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Remove item from order\n public Order removeItemFromOrder(Long orderId, Long productId) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(orderId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + orderId));\n \n OrderItem itemToRemove = order.getOrderItems().stream()\n .filter(item -> item.getProduct().getId().equals(productId))\n .findFirst()\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found in order\"));\n \n // Restore product stock\n productService.increaseStock(productId, itemToRemove.getQuantity());\n \n order.removeOrderItem(itemToRemove);\n orderItemRepository.delete(itemToRemove);\n \n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Update item quantity in order\n public Order updateItemQuantity(Long orderId, Long productId, Integer newQuantity) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(orderId)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + orderId));\n \n OrderItem item = order.getOrderItems().stream()\n .filter(orderItem -> orderItem.getProduct().getId().equals(productId))\n .findFirst()\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Product not found in order\"));\n \n Product product = item.getProduct();\n int currentQuantity = item.getQuantity();\n int quantityDifference = newQuantity - currentQuantity;\n \n if (quantityDifference > 0) {\n // Increasing quantity - check stock\n if (product.getStockQuantity() < quantityDifference) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Insufficient stock for product: \" + product.getName());\n }\n productService.reduceStock(productId, quantityDifference);\n } else if (quantityDifference < 0) {\n // Decreasing quantity - restore stock\n productService.increaseStock(productId, Math.abs(quantityDifference));\n }\n \n item.setQuantity(newQuantity);\n orderItemRepository.save(item);\n \n order.calculateTotalAmount();\n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Cancel order\n public Order cancelOrder(Long id) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + id));\n \n if (order.getStatus() == OrderStatus.DELIVERED) {\n throw new IllegalArgumentException(\"Cannot cancel a delivered order\");\n }\n \n // Restore stock for all items\n for (OrderItem item : order.getOrderItems()) {\n productService.increaseStock(item.getProduct().getId(), item.getQuantity());\n }\n \n order.setStatus(OrderStatus.CANCELLED);\n return orderRepository.save(order);\n }\n \n // Delete order\n public void deleteOrder(Long id) {\n Order order = orderRepository.findById(id)\n .orElseThrow(() -> new RuntimeException(\"Order not found with id: \" + id));\n \n // Restore stock for all items if order is not cancelled\n if (order.getStatus() != OrderStatus.CANCELLED) {\n for (OrderItem item : order.getOrderItems()) {\n productService.increaseStock(item.getProduct().getId(), item.getQuantity());\n }\n }\n \n orderRepository.delete(order);\n }\n \n // Get orders by date range\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getOrdersByDateRange(LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate) {\n return orderRepository.findByOrderDateBetween(startDate, endDate);\n }\n \n // Get recent orders\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public List getRecentOrders() {\n LocalDateTime thirtyDaysAgo = LocalDateTime.now().minusDays(30);\n return orderRepository.findRecentOrders(thirtyDaysAgo);\n }\n \n // Get total sales amount\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public BigDecimal getTotalSalesAmount() {\n return orderRepository.getTotalSalesAmount();\n }\n \n // Get order count by status\n @Transactional(readOnly = true)\n public Long getOrderCountByStatus(OrderStatus status) {\n return orderRepository.countOrdersByStatus(status);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.controller;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Customer;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.service.CustomerService;\nimport jakarta.validation.Valid;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/customers\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\")\npublic class CustomerController {\n \n private final CustomerService customerService;\n \n @Autowired\n public CustomerController(CustomerService customerService) {\n this.customerService = customerService;\n }\n \n // Create a new customer\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity createCustomer(@Valid @RequestBody Customer customer) {\n try {\n Customer createdCustomer = customerService.createCustomer(customer);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdCustomer, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error creating customer: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get all customers\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity> getAllCustomers() {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.getAllCustomers();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get customer by ID\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity getCustomerById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Optional customer = customerService.getCustomerById(id);\n if (customer.isPresent()) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customer.get(), HttpStatus.OK);\n } else {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Customer not found with id: \" + id, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error retrieving customer: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get customer by email\n @GetMapping(\"/email/{email}\")\n public ResponseEntity getCustomerByEmail(@PathVariable String email) {\n try {\n Optional customer = customerService.getCustomerByEmail(email);\n if (customer.isPresent()) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customer.get(), HttpStatus.OK);\n } else {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Customer not found with email: \" + email, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error retrieving customer: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Update customer\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity updateCustomer(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody Customer customerDetails) {\n try {\n Customer updatedCustomer = customerService.updateCustomer(id, customerDetails);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedCustomer, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error updating customer: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Delete customer\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity deleteCustomer(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n customerService.deleteCustomer(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Customer deleted successfully\", HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error deleting customer: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Search customers by name\n @GetMapping(\"/search\")\n public ResponseEntity> searchCustomers(@RequestParam String name) {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.searchCustomersByName(name);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Search customers by first name\n @GetMapping(\"/search/firstname\")\n public ResponseEntity> searchCustomersByFirstName(@RequestParam String firstName) {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.searchCustomersByFirstName(firstName);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Search customers by last name\n @GetMapping(\"/search/lastname\")\n public ResponseEntity> searchCustomersByLastName(@RequestParam String lastName) {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.searchCustomersByLastName(lastName);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get customers with orders\n @GetMapping(\"/with-orders\")\n public ResponseEntity> getCustomersWithOrders() {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.getCustomersWithOrders();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get customers without orders\n @GetMapping(\"/without-orders\")\n public ResponseEntity> getCustomersWithoutOrders() {\n try {\n List customers = customerService.getCustomersWithoutOrders();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(customers, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Check if email exists\n @GetMapping(\"/exists/email/{email}\")\n public ResponseEntity checkEmailExists(@PathVariable String email) {\n try {\n boolean exists = customerService.existsByEmail(email);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(exists, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.controller;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Product;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.service.ProductService;\nimport jakarta.validation.Valid;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/products\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\")\npublic class ProductController {\n \n private final ProductService productService;\n \n @Autowired\n public ProductController(ProductService productService) {\n this.productService = productService;\n }\n \n // Create a new product\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity createProduct(@Valid @RequestBody Product product) {\n try {\n Product createdProduct = productService.createProduct(product);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdProduct, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error creating product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get all products\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity> getAllProducts() {\n try {\n List products = productService.getAllProducts();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get product by ID\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity getProductById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Optional product = productService.getProductById(id);\n if (product.isPresent()) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(product.get(), HttpStatus.OK);\n } else {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Product not found with id: \" + id, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error retrieving product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Update product\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity updateProduct(@PathVariable Long id, @Valid @RequestBody Product productDetails) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.updateProduct(id, productDetails);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedProduct, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error updating product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Delete product\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity deleteProduct(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n productService.deleteProduct(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Product deleted successfully\", HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error deleting product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Search products by name\n @GetMapping(\"/search\")\n public ResponseEntity> searchProducts(@RequestParam String keyword) {\n try {\n List products = productService.searchProducts(keyword);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Search products by name\n @GetMapping(\"/search/name\")\n public ResponseEntity> searchProductsByName(@RequestParam String name) {\n try {\n List products = productService.searchProductsByName(name);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get products by category\n @GetMapping(\"/category/{category}\")\n public ResponseEntity> getProductsByCategory(@PathVariable String category) {\n try {\n List products = productService.getProductsByCategory(category);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get products by brand\n @GetMapping(\"/brand/{brand}\")\n public ResponseEntity> getProductsByBrand(@PathVariable String brand) {\n try {\n List products = productService.getProductsByBrand(brand);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get active products\n @GetMapping(\"/active\")\n public ResponseEntity> getActiveProducts() {\n try {\n List products = productService.getActiveProducts();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get products in stock\n @GetMapping(\"/in-stock\")\n public ResponseEntity> getProductsInStock() {\n try {\n List products = productService.getProductsInStock();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get products out of stock\n @GetMapping(\"/out-of-stock\")\n public ResponseEntity> getProductsOutOfStock() {\n try {\n List products = productService.getProductsOutOfStock();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get products by price range\n @GetMapping(\"/price-range\")\n public ResponseEntity> getProductsByPriceRange(\n @RequestParam BigDecimal minPrice, \n @RequestParam BigDecimal maxPrice) {\n try {\n List products = productService.getProductsByPriceRange(minPrice, maxPrice);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get top selling products\n @GetMapping(\"/top-selling\")\n public ResponseEntity> getTopSellingProducts() {\n try {\n List products = productService.getTopSellingProducts();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(products, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get distinct categories\n @GetMapping(\"/categories\")\n public ResponseEntity> getDistinctCategories() {\n try {\n List categories = productService.getDistinctCategories();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(categories, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get distinct brands\n @GetMapping(\"/brands\")\n public ResponseEntity> getDistinctBrands() {\n try {\n List brands = productService.getDistinctBrands();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(brands, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Update stock quantity\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/stock\")\n public ResponseEntity updateStock(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam Integer stockQuantity) {\n try {\n Product updatedProduct = productService.updateStock(id, stockQuantity);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedProduct, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error updating stock: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Activate product\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/activate\")\n public ResponseEntity activateProduct(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Product product = productService.activateProduct(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(product, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error activating product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Deactivate product\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/deactivate\")\n public ResponseEntity deactivateProduct(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Product product = productService.deactivateProduct(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(product, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error deactivating product: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"File IF MORE CONTENT NEEDS TO BE ADDED USE THE str-replace-editor TOOL TO EDIT THE FILE AFTER IT HAS BEEN CREATED.", "path": "src/main/java/com/example/ecommerce/controller/OrderController.java", "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.controller;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Order;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.OrderStatus;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.service.OrderService;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.format.annotation.DateTimeFormat;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.*;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\nimport java.time.LocalDateTime;\nimport java.util.List;\nimport java.util.Optional;\n\n@RestController\n@RequestMapping(\"/api/orders\")\n@CrossOrigin(origins = \"*\")\npublic class OrderController {\n \n private final OrderService orderService;\n \n @Autowired\n public OrderController(OrderService orderService) {\n this.orderService = orderService;\n }\n \n // Create a new order\n @PostMapping\n public ResponseEntity createOrder(@RequestParam Long customerId, \n @RequestParam(required = false) String shippingAddress) {\n try {\n Order createdOrder = orderService.createOrder(customerId, shippingAddress);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(createdOrder, HttpStatus.CREATED);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error creating order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get all orders\n @GetMapping\n public ResponseEntity> getAllOrders() {\n try {\n List orders = orderService.getAllOrders();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(orders, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get order by ID\n @GetMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity getOrderById(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Optional order = orderService.getOrderById(id);\n if (order.isPresent()) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(order.get(), HttpStatus.OK);\n } else {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Order not found with id: \" + id, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error retrieving order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get orders by customer ID\n @GetMapping(\"/customer/{customerId}\")\n public ResponseEntity> getOrdersByCustomerId(@PathVariable Long customerId) {\n try {\n List orders = orderService.getOrdersByCustomerId(customerId);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(orders, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get orders by status\n @GetMapping(\"/status/{status}\")\n public ResponseEntity> getOrdersByStatus(@PathVariable OrderStatus status) {\n try {\n List orders = orderService.getOrdersByStatus(status);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(orders, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Update order status\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/status\")\n public ResponseEntity updateOrderStatus(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestParam OrderStatus status) {\n try {\n Order updatedOrder = orderService.updateOrderStatus(id, status);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedOrder, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error updating order status: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Add item to order\n @PostMapping(\"/{orderId}/items\")\n public ResponseEntity addItemToOrder(@PathVariable Long orderId,\n @RequestParam Long productId,\n @RequestParam Integer quantity) {\n try {\n Order updatedOrder = orderService.addItemToOrder(orderId, productId, quantity);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedOrder, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error adding item to order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Remove item from order\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{orderId}/items/{productId}\")\n public ResponseEntity removeItemFromOrder(@PathVariable Long orderId, @PathVariable Long productId) {\n try {\n Order updatedOrder = orderService.removeItemFromOrder(orderId, productId);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedOrder, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error removing item from order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Update item quantity in order\n @PutMapping(\"/{orderId}/items/{productId}\")\n public ResponseEntity updateItemQuantity(@PathVariable Long orderId,\n @PathVariable Long productId,\n @RequestParam Integer quantity) {\n try {\n Order updatedOrder = orderService.updateItemQuantity(orderId, productId, quantity);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(updatedOrder, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error updating item quantity: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Cancel order\n @PutMapping(\"/{id}/cancel\")\n public ResponseEntity cancelOrder(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n Order cancelledOrder = orderService.cancelOrder(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(cancelledOrder, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error cancelling order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Delete order\n @DeleteMapping(\"/{id}\")\n public ResponseEntity deleteOrder(@PathVariable Long id) {\n try {\n orderService.deleteOrder(id);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Order deleted successfully\", HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (RuntimeException e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(\"Error deleting order: \" + e.getMessage(), HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get orders by date range\n @GetMapping(\"/date-range\")\n public ResponseEntity> getOrdersByDateRange(\n @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso = DateTimeFormat.ISO.DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime startDate,\n @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(iso = DateTimeFormat.ISO.DATE_TIME) LocalDateTime endDate) {\n try {\n List orders = orderService.getOrdersByDateRange(startDate, endDate);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(orders, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get recent orders (last 30 days)\n @GetMapping(\"/recent\")\n public ResponseEntity> getRecentOrders() {\n try {\n List orders = orderService.getRecentOrders();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(orders, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get total sales amount\n @GetMapping(\"/total-sales\")\n public ResponseEntity getTotalSalesAmount() {\n try {\n BigDecimal totalSales = orderService.getTotalSalesAmount();\n return new ResponseEntity<>(totalSales, HttpStatus.OK);\n } catch (Exception e) {\n return new ResponseEntity<>(HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n }\n \n // Get order count by status\n }\n public void setSuccess(boolean success) { this.success = success; }\n \n public String getMessage() { return message; }\n public void setMessage(String message) { this.message = message; }\n \n public T getData() { return data; }\n public void setData(T data) { this.data = data; }\n \n public String getError() { return error; }\n public void setError(String error) { this.error = error; }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":""},{"id":3,"type":2,"content":""},{"id":4,"type":3,"content":""}],"seen_state":"seen","structured_request_nodes":[{"id":1,"type":1,"tool_result_node":{"content":"Task list updated successfully. "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.exception;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.dto.ApiResponse;\nimport org.springframework.http.HttpStatus;\nimport org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity;\nimport org.springframework.validation.FieldError;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.MethodArgumentNotValidException;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.ExceptionHandler;\nimport org.springframework.web.bind.annotation.RestControllerAdvice;\n\nimport java.util.HashMap;\nimport java.util.Map;\n\n@RestControllerAdvice\npublic class GlobalExceptionHandler {\n \n @ExceptionHandler(MethodArgumentNotValidException.class)\n public ResponseEntity>> handleValidationExceptions(\n MethodArgumentNotValidException ex) {\n Map errors = new HashMap<>();\n ex.getBindingResult().getAllErrors().forEach((error) -> {\n String fieldName = ((FieldError) error).getField();\n String errorMessage = error.getDefaultMessage();\n errors.put(fieldName, errorMessage);\n });\n \n ApiResponse> response = ApiResponse.error(\"Validation failed\", errors.toString());\n response.setData(errors);\n return new ResponseEntity<>(response, HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n }\n \n @ExceptionHandler(RuntimeException.class)\n public ResponseEntity> handleRuntimeException(RuntimeException ex) {\n ApiResponse response = ApiResponse.error(ex.getMessage());\n return new ResponseEntity<>(response, HttpStatus.NOT_FOUND);\n }\n \n @ExceptionHandler(IllegalArgumentException.class)\n public ResponseEntity> handleIllegalArgumentException(IllegalArgumentException ex) {\n ApiResponse response = ApiResponse.error(ex.getMessage());\n return new ResponseEntity<>(response, HttpStatus.BAD_REQUEST);\n }\n \n @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class)\n public ResponseEntity> handleGenericException(Exception ex) {\n ApiResponse response = ApiResponse.error(\"An unexpected error occurred: \" + ex.getMessage());\n return new ResponseEntity<>(response, HttpStatus.INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR);\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Now let me create a global exception handler for better error handling: "file_content": "package com.example.ecommerce.config;\n\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Customer;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.entity.Product;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.service.CustomerService;\nimport com.example.ecommerce.service.ProductService;\nimport org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Autowired;\nimport org.springframework.boot.CommandLineRunner;\nimport org.springframework.stereotype.Component;\n\nimport java.math.BigDecimal;\n\n@Component\npublic class DataInitializer implements CommandLineRunner {\n \n private final CustomerService customerService;\n private final ProductService productService;\n \n @Autowired\n public DataInitializer(CustomerService customerService, ProductService productService) {\n this.customerService = customerService;\n this.productService = productService;\n }\n \n @Override\n public void run(String... args) throws Exception {\n // Initialize sample customers\n initializeCustomers();\n \n // Initialize sample products\n initializeProducts();\n }\n \n private void initializeCustomers() {\n if (customerService.getAllCustomers().isEmpty()) {\n // Create sample customers\n Customer customer1 = new Customer(\"John\", \"Doe\", \"john.doe@example.com\");\n customer1.setPhone(\"+1234567890\");\n customer1.setAddress(\"123 Main St, New York, NY 10001\");\n customerService.createCustomer(customer1);\n \n Customer customer2 = new Customer(\"Jane\", \"Smith\", \"jane.smith@example.com\");\n customer2.setPhone(\"+1234567891\");\n customer2.setAddress(\"456 Oak Ave, Los Angeles, CA 90001\");\n customerService.createCustomer(customer2);\n \n Customer customer3 = new Customer(\"Bob\", \"Johnson\", \"bob.johnson@example.com\");\n customer3.setPhone(\"+1234567892\");\n customer3.setAddress(\"789 Pine St, Chicago, IL 60601\");\n customerService.createCustomer(customer3);\n \n System.out.println(\"Sample customers initialized.\");\n }\n }\n \n private void initializeProducts() {\n if (productService.getAllProducts().isEmpty()) {\n // Create sample products\n Product product1 = new Product(\"iPhone 15\", new BigDecimal(\"999.99\"), 50);\n product1.setDescription(\"Latest iPhone with advanced features\");\n product1.setCategory(\"Electronics\");\n product1.setBrand(\"Apple\");\n productService.createProduct(product1);\n \n Product product2 = new Product(\"Samsung Galaxy S24\", new BigDecimal(\"899.99\"), 30);\n product2.setDescription(\"Flagship Android smartphone\");\n product2.setCategory(\"Electronics\");\n product2.setBrand(\"Samsung\");\n productService.createProduct(product2);\n \n Product product3 = new Product(\"MacBook Pro\", new BigDecimal(\"1999.99\"), 20);\n product3.setDescription(\"Professional laptop for developers\");\n product3.setCategory(\"Computers\");\n product3.setBrand(\"Apple\");\n productService.createProduct(product3);\n \n Product product4 = new Product(\"Dell XPS 13\", new BigDecimal(\"1299.99\"), 25);\n product4.setDescription(\"Ultrabook with premium design\");\n product4.setCategory(\"Computers\");\n product4.setBrand(\"Dell\");\n productService.createProduct(product4);\n \n Product product5 = new Product(\"AirPods Pro\", new BigDecimal(\"249.99\"), 100);\n product5.setDescription(\"Wireless earbuds with noise cancellation\");\n product5.setCategory(\"Audio\");\n product5.setBrand(\"Apple\");\n productService.createProduct(product5);\n \n Product product6 = new Product(\"Sony WH-1000XM5\", new BigDecimal(\"399.99\"), 40);\n product6.setDescription(\"Premium noise-canceling headphones\");\n product6.setCategory(\"Audio\");\n product6.setBrand(\"Sony\");\n productService.createProduct(product6);\n \n System.out.println(\"Sample products initialized.\");\n }\n }\n}"}","mcp_server_name":"","mcp_tool_name":""}},{"id":2,"type":0,"content":"Let me also
